entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 33.
